title: Culture-Leisure-Education Integration Program for Leveraging Educational Potential of Traditional Folk Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of folk culture and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Program focused on applying Japanese traditional folk culture education case studies to Russian and Korean educational contexts. Participants develop practical competencies through cultural content creation and instructional activity design experiences.

learning_goals: One can derive three or more educational applications through case analysis of Japanese traditional folk culture.
One can design educational activity plans utilizing folk arts (origami, traditional games, etc.).
One can create and share cultural education content using digital tools (Canva, Padlet, etc.).
One can develop community-applicable folk culture programs through project-based collaboration.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
